description: Listen to a special, extended episode of the Rams Daily podcast after the sacking of Derby boss Paul Warne.
title: Derby County: Rams Daily podcast special on Paul Warne sacking
title_page: Derby County: Rams Daily podcast special on Paul Warne sacking - BBC Sport
maintext:
The fine folks at BBC Radio Derby have produced an extended version of the Rams Daily podcast to cover Friday's sacking of boss Paul Warne.
They speak to former Derby players Eric Steele, Curtis Davies and Malcolm Christie as well as hearing the views of Rams' supporters too.
